RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer Class

In this Article

Exposes RibbonTab types to UI Automation.

Syntax

Declaration

public class RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer : System.Windows.Automation.Peers.SelectorItemAutomationPeer, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider, System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider

Constructors summary

RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer(Object,RibbonAutomationPeer)

Initializes a new instance of the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer class.

Methods summary

GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

Gets the control type for the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.
GetClassNameCore()

Gets the class name of the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.
GetPattern(PatternInterface)

Gets the control pattern for the RibbonTab that is associated with the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.
IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand()

Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.
IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState

Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.
IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView()

Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region of the container.
ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection()

This API is not implemented.
ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection()

This API is not implemented.

Constructors

  • RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer(Object,RibbonAutomationPeer)

    Initializes a new instance of the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer class.

    public RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer (object item, System.Windows.Automation.Peers.RibbonAutomationPeer itemsControlPeer);

    Parameters

    • item
      Object

      The element associated with this automation peer.

    • itemsControlPeer
      RibbonAutomationPeer

      The RibbonAutomationPeer that is associated with the Ribbon that holds the RibbonTab.

Methods

  • GetAutomationControlTypeCore()

    Gets the control type for the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*.

    • AutomationControlType

      The AutomationControlType enumeration value.

  • GetClassNameCore()

    Gets the class name of the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer. This method is called by stem.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*.

    protected override string GetClassNameCore ();

    Returns

    • String

      The class name of the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

  • GetPattern(PatternInterface)

    Gets the control pattern for the RibbonTab that is associated with the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

    public override object GetPattern (System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface patternInterface);

    Parameters

    • patternInterface
      PatternInterface

      A value enumeration that specifies the control pattern.

    Returns

    • Object

      An object that supports the control pattern if patternInterface is PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, PatternInterface, or PatternInterface; otherwise, null.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse()

    Hides all nodes, controls, or content that are descendants of the control.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Collapse ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand()

    Displays all child nodes, controls, or content of the control.

    void IExpandCollapseProvider.Expand ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState

    Gets the state, expanded or collapsed, of the control that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

    System.Windows.Automation.ExpandCollapseState System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IExpandCollapseProvider.ExpandCollapseState { get; }

    Returns

    • ExpandCollapseState

      The state of the control that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IExpandCollapseProvider interface.

  • IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView()

    Scrolls the content area of a container object in order to display the control within the visible region of the container.

    void IScrollItemProvider.ScrollIntoView ();

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an IScrollItemProvider interface.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection()

    This API is not implemented.

    void ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection ();

    Exceptions

    • ElementNotEnabledException

      The user cannot interact with the RibbonTab that is associated with the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer.

    • InvalidOperationException

      A element other than the RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer is selected.

  • ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection()

    This API is not implemented.

    void ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection ();

    Exceptions

    • InvalidOperationException

      The RibbonTab that is associated with this RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer is selected.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the RibbonTabDataAutomationPeer instance is cast to an ISelectionItemProvider interface.
